entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -26.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pincher Creek Airport 01:40 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -26.1°C
Pressure: 104.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -29.3°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:09 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:09 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:09 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
